example.text: His efforts helped convince the pipeline company's decision to shut down the project in September, 2021. Other bills of note introduced by Tom include legislation that passed the House to seize and sell the assets of oligarchs whose wealth is linked to Vladimir Putin and repurpose the funds to benefit the Ukrainian People.
